description: Learn how to cook barramundi with a delicious herb and macadamia crust. It's on the table in just 25 minutes and it's sure to impress.
keywords: Fish dishes,Fish,Quick & easy dinner,Quick & easy lunch,Seafood dishes,Barramundi
name: MacadamiaCrusted Barramundi Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 720g fresh Australian saltwater barramundi fillets, skin on

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 230°C/210°C fanforced. Line a baking tray with baking paper and lightly grease paper.

Reserve 3 thyme sprigs. Pick leaves from remaining thyme sprigs. Place macadamias, bread, chives, oil and thyme leaves in a food processor and process until almost fine crumbs form. Place fish, skinsides down, on tray. Press crumb mixture over fish. Bake for 15 minutes or until crumb is golden and fish is cooked through (cover loosely with foil if over-browning).
Meanwhile, prepare salad according to packet instructions. Sprinkle fish with reserved thyme sprigs and serve fish with salad and lemon.
